channel.title: Bartenders Show
channel.description: The Bartenders Show is heard around the World! The Bartenders Show is all about Bartending including Bartender Interviews, Bartending News, Flair Bartending, Bartending Business and everything about bartending.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The “Bartenders Show” is heard around the World! Bartenders podcast audio show for and about bartenders.
channel.itunes:summary: The Bartenders Show is heard around the World! The “Bartenders Show” is all about Bartending including Bartender Interviews, Bartending News, Flair Bartending, Bartender Websites, Bartending Business and everything about bartending. Bartender Rich talks about his bartending experiences and how to get into the business of bartending private parties.
channel.itunes:author: Richard Suess

item.title: Bartenders Show 2010-12-24 #24
item.description: Interview with Marc Levine from ModelBartenders.com and PremierPartyServers.com! Marc has built his bartending business in most major cities across the states.
item.author: rsuess@bartendersshow.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Marc Levine from ModelBartenders.com and PremierPartySservers.com!
item.itunes:summary: Interview with Marc Levine from ModelBartenders.com and PremierPartyServers.com! Marc has built his bartending business in most major cities across the states.
item.itunes:author: Richard Suess
item.itunes:keywords: Bartenders Show, Bartender, Bartenders, Bartending, Flair Bartending, Bartender News, Bartending Product Reviews

item.title: Bartenders Show 2010-08-14 #23
item.description: Interview with Trevor Estelle! Trevor is Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Health Communications, Inc (Providers of the TIPS Programs) worldwide. Trevor talks to us about the TIPS program and how it helps us do our bartender and server jobs better. Special guest Mary does the bartender news. All show notes can be found at http://www.bartendersshow.com
item.author: rsuess@bartendersshow.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Trevor Estelle! Trevor is Vice President of Sales and Marketing for Health Communications, Inc (Providers of the TIPS Programs) worldwide.

item.title: Bartenders Show 2009-12-11 #22
item.description: Interview with Flair Bartender Robert Husted CEO of Barwars LLC. Rob brings us all up to date on all the things happened this year! He also talks about some of the things to come in 2010. All show notes can be found at http://www.bartendersshow.com

item.title: Bartenders Podcast Show 2008-06-13 #21
item.description: Interview with Jeff Berry! Jeff is the author of Beachbum Berry's Grog Log, which the New York Times hailed as the world's first "serious tiki cocktail book" and US News & World Report dubbed "the island bar bible." Rich talks about how bad some Summer drinks can be for your diet. All show notes can be found at http://www.bartendersshow.com
item.author: rsuess@bartendersshow.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Jeff Berry! Jeff is the author of Beachbum Berry's Grog Log, which the New York Times hailed as the world's first "serious tiki cocktail book" and US News & World Report dubbed "the island bar bible."

item.title: Bartenders Podcast Show 2008-01-25 #20
item.description: Rich and Becky talk about the 2008 Bartenders Cruise. Great time was had by all who attended the 5 day Eastern Caribbean Cruise.
item.author: rsuess@bartendersshow.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Rich and Becky talk about the 2008 Bartenders Cruise. Great time was had by all who attended the 5 day Eastern Caribbean Cruise.
item.itunes:summary: Rich and Becky talk about the 2008 Bartenders Cruise. Great time was had by all who attended the 5 day Eastern Caribbean Cruise. This Bartenders Show covers some of the activities during the 5 day cruise. Rich and Becky are already working on next year's cruise! We hope all The Bartenders Show listeners can make the cruise next year!
item.itunes:author: Richard Suess
item.itunes:keywords: Bartenders Show, Bartender, Bartenders, Bartending, Flair Bartending, Bartender News, Bartending Product Reviews

item.title: Bartenders Podcast Show 2007-10-26 #19
item.description: Becky and Rich talk about some interesting bartending news. An update on the 2008 Bartenders Cruise on January 14, 2008. New feature on the Bartenders Show is bartending product reviews. If you have a new bartending product and looking for some great exposure around the world send your information to reviews@bartendersshow.com.

item.title: Bartenders Podcast Show 2007-07-27 #18
item.description: Interview with Flair Bartender Robert Husted CEO of Barwars LLC a successful Flair Bartending competition in Florida. Also Vice President of Flairbar.com and the FBA Rep for the Southeastern United States. Becky and Rich talk about some interesting bartending news. An update on the 2008 Bartenders Cruise on January 14, 2008. The pickup line of the week! New feature on the Bartenders Show is bartending product reviews. item.title: Bartenders Podcast Show 2007-05-11 #15
item.description: Bartenders Cruise 2008 Bartenders Rich and Becky talk about the 5-Day Eastern Caribbean Cruise with Carnival Cruise Lines on January 14, 2008. All bartenders are invited as well any guests. This cruise will start in Miami, FL going to Grand Turk Islands, Half Moon Cay, Nassau in the Bahamas and back to Miami, FL.
item.author: rsuess@bartendersshow.com

item.description: The business of Bartending Private Parties! Bartenders Show hosts Rich and Becky talk about bartending private parties.
